OOC:Hey, It's cool.  But get creative with the insults. Like, 
Megatron's mom is a calulator and his father's a fax machine.  Or 
Megatron's mom was an IBM computer and his dad was a wrist watch. 
Well, you get the idea. LOL)

::DarkMouse::  
She transformed into mouse mode and followed Inferno. She noticed how 
the area looked familiar.  She then realized where she was 
going. "Hey, we're heading for Arachnia's lair. I may not be welcome 
there. And what do you mean by Megatron's forces? If Megatron is 
dead, then his forces will disperse.  They won't stay together.  And 
why are you in such a hurry?"  She ran and scurried along, gaining on 
him and then running side by side. "Hang on. If Black Aracnia doesn't 
want me back, i'm as good as scrap, would you radio ahead and find 
out what she would IF you say you found me? I mean, i don't want to 
just walk in to a death trap."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry about the Bitch thing....I am a main offender in that 
case.
> 
>     Rampage and Tankkor emerged from the ship. They were on there 
way to hunt 
> down Megatron, but now it appeared that Dinobot was paying them a 
visit. 
> "Commander Quickstrike, where is he?" Rampage said, squinting his 
optics a 
> the horizon.
>     
>     Inferno exited the forest and saw the Predacon ship ahead. He 
glanced 
> back at Darkmouse, "Hurry! The Queen will be very displeased if you 
dont 
> hurry up! For all we know, Megatrons forces could be...be....up to 
something."
